channel.title: How to make npc 100% doesnt walk( even when you attack!)
channel.description:
Hello,
How to make a npc doesnt walk..
[code]spawn = 1 3087 3495 0 0 0 0 0 1[/code]
but when you use mage on it, it walks to you
how to fix?
,thanks I D D S I
